title: Tractor sense
creator_credit: Technical and Scientific Films, John O'Neill and Patrick Pullen
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Safer Farming”.
Gives examples of three fatal accidents with tractors and explains how they could have been avoided if the tractors had been handled properly.
creator_credit_for_label: Technical and Scientific Films, John O’Neill and Patrick Pullen
